openings.description: Double door entrance with a covered veranda, ensuring privacy and security.
Sliding doors leading to the balcony and rooftop terrace.
Large windows in key areas to maximize natural light and ventilation, designed according to Vastu principles.

additional_features.description: A fully functional rooftop terrace offering panoramic views and a relaxing outdoor space. It includes seating area, planters for enhancing the garden feel, and is designed in accordance with local building norms.

A dedicated home theater integrated into the living room or adjacent to it, complete with acoustic treatment and comfortable seating. The design ensures minimal interference with daily routines while providing a high-end entertainment experience.
